pages.text: Looking for a venue for private events? Our farm event layout options are customizable to fit almost any size event!

September 27 10:00 am
-
8:00 pm
Fall Festival at Southern Hill Farms
Southern Hill Farms
16651 Schofield Road, Clermont
Join us for the 10th Annual Southern Hill Farms Fall Festival, taking place select Thursdays and every Friday-Sunday from September 27 to November 23! Admission tickets are required for this event and must be purchased online in advance for all guests ages 3 and older. Please note, payments are not accepted at the farm. Admission tickets give you access to all activities during the event. Children 2 and under are free and do not need an admission ticket to enter. More information and tickets are available here: https://southernhillfarms.ticketspice.com/fall-festival-2025. Join the Fall Festival Fun! Fall Festival Fun Includes:  Fun Zone Bungee...
$26.95
